Sentencas: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (LTSOFC) has shown great potentials for commercial applications in clean energy generation.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Seeking for low cost and easy fabrication method is one of the most important issues for LTSOFC investigations.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: This paper introduces a new coating spray technology, namely Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS), for efficiently manufacturing different functional coatings of LTSOFC.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: By applying the LPPS technique, uniform and dense Ni0.8CO0.15Al0.05LiO2_delta (NCAL) coatings were made on both solid bipolar plates and porous nickel foams to perform as protecting coatings and electrode catalyst coatings respectively.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Microstructure study showed that multi phases were formed and in situ nano-micro crystallization occurred in the coatings during the LPPS process.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Around 30 W output was achieved in a 4-cell stack indicating that the LPPS sprayed NCAL coatings on bipolar plates worked well.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: A fuel cell based on the NCAL-coated Ni foam reached an open circuit voltage (OCV) at 1.08 V and a maximum power density of 717 mW cm(-2) at 550 degrees C.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: This study reveals that LPPS is a promising technology for fabricating coatings of LTSOFC.
Titulo: Applying Low-Pressure Plasma Spray (LPPS) for coatings in low-temperature SOFC
